main event: Witnesses reported an unidentified flying object observed over Westford, Massachusetts on 8 October 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as being 40 to 50 feet in diameter with a bright orange color., It hovered for approximately 15 minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing., Two other separate witnesses reported sighting the same object at the same time., One witness described the object as emitting a bright white light and being circular in shape., The sightings were documented as part of Project Blue Book but were marked as unreliable.
witness description: civilian witnesses including a mother and her son, and another unidentified professional witness
